params.label: A human‐readable label (e.g. "api", "news", "tweet")—hashed on‐chain.
params.sourceDesc: Freeform text explaining what the source is.
params.topicId: The topic to attach this source to (must exist and not be expired).
params.url: URL of the source (stored fully as string).

params.assertedTruthfully: True if UMA/DVM agreed with the claim; false if disputed/lost.
params.assertionId: The UMA-generated ID for this assertion.

params._description: Short description of what this topic is about.
params.duration: How long (in seconds) new sources can be submitted before “expiry.”

assertSource(bytes32,string,string,strin.notice: Submit a new “source” under a given topic, which UMA will verify.

assertionDisputedCallback(bytes32).notice: Called by UMA if someone disputes an active assertion.

assertionResolvedCallback(bytes32,bool).notice: UMA calls this when an assertion's liveness ends (either undisputed or successfully verified).

getSource(bytes32).notice: Fetch the Source struct (including final status) by its UMA assertionId.

getTopic(bytes32).notice: Fetch all UMA-generated assertion IDs for a topic.
